mapper.select: select R.request_id as request_id, R.sender_id as sender_id, R.courier_id as courier_id, R.request_type as request_type, R.request_status as request_status, R.cargo_name as cargo_name, R.delivery_price as delivery_price, R.cargo_picture as cargo_picture, R.cargo_desc as cargo_desc, R.sender_phone as sender_phone, R.pickup_min_time as pickup_min_time, R.pickup_max_time as pickup_max_time, R.pickup_place as pickup_place, R.pickup_place_desc as pickup_place_desc, R.receiver_name as receiver_name, R.receiver_phone as receiver_phone, R.arrival_place as arrival_place, R.arrival_place_desc as arrival_place_desc, R.absence_message as absence_message, R.validation_code as validation_code, R.expire_date as expire_date, RC.cmt_id as cmt_id, RC.request_id as request_cmts_request_id, RC.user_id as request_cmts_user_id, RC.reply_text as request_cmts_reply_text, RC.reply_picture as request_cmts_reply_picture from REQUESTS R left join REQUEST_CMTS RC on R.request_id=RC.request_id where R.request_id=#{requestId} order by RC.cmt_id DESC
mapper.update: update REQUESTS set request_status=1, courier_id=null where request_id=#{requestId}
mapper.select: select R.request_id as request_id, R.cargo_name as cargo_name, U.user_id as user_id, U.courier_avg_time as courier_avg_time, U.courier_avg_kind as courier_avg_kind, U.courier_avg_safe as courier_avg_safe, U.courier_totalcnt as courier_totalcnt, U.courier_successcnt as courier_successcnt, R.request_status as request_status, C.sender_evalstatus as sender_evalstatus from REQUESTS R left join USERS U on R.courier_id=U.user_id left join COMPLETE_DELIVERYS C on R.request_id=C.request_id where R.request_id not in ( select request_id from REPORTS ) and R.sender_id=#{userId}

select R.request_id as request_id, R.cargo_name as cargo_name, U.user_id as user_id, U.sender_avg_time as sender_avg_time, U.sender_avg_kind as sender_avg_kind, U.sender_avg_thing as sender_avg_thing, U.sender_totalcnt as sender_totalcnt, U.sender_successcnt as sender_successcnt, R.request_status as request_status, R.expire_date as expire_date, C.courier_evalstatus as courier_evalstatus from REQUESTS R left join USERS U on R.sender_id=U.user_id left join COMPLETE_DELIVERYS C on R.request_id=C.request_id where R.request_id not in ( select request_id from REPORTS ) and R.courier_id=#{userId}

select RP.request_id as request_id, R.cargo_name as cargo_name, RP.reported_user_id as reported_user_id, RP.report_user_id as report_user_id, RT.report_type_desc as report_type_desc, RP.report_date as report_date, RP.report_status as report_status from REPORTS RP left join REQUESTS R on RP.request_id=R.request_id left join REPORT_TYPE RT on RP.report_type=RT.report_type where RP.reported_user_id=#{userId} or RP.report_user_id=#{userId}
